channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (short_term)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: Kelly Chen @ Chase Center
item.description: 2025-12-20 04:00 — Kelly Chen at Chase Center. Kelly Chen is a major pop star with a dedicated following, making her upcoming live show a highly anticipated event.

item.title: Not So Silent Night @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2025-12-15 03:00 — Not So Silent Night at SAP Center at San Jose. Not So Silent Night features a lineup of popular alt-rock acts, promising a vibrant festival atmosphere.

item.title: KATSEYE @ The Theater at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2025-12-06 04:00 → 2025-12-07 04:00 — KATSEYE at The Theater at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. KATSEYE is gaining traction with their unique sound and engaging live performances, making this tour noteworthy.

item.title: Public Service Broadcasting @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2025-12-04 04:00 — Public Service Broadcasting at The Fillmore. Public Service Broadcasting is known for their innovative live shows that blend music and visuals, making this a must-see.

item.title: Motion City Soundtrack @ Warfield
item.description: 2025-12-06 03:30 — Motion City Soundtrack at Warfield. Motion City Soundtrack and Say Anything are both beloved bands with strong fanbases, ensuring a nostalgic and energetic show.

item.title: The Mountain Goats @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2025-12-11 04:00 — The Mountain Goats at The Fillmore. The Mountain Goats have a reputation for captivating live performances and a dedicated following, making this a standout event.

item.title: Couch @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2025-12-12 04:00 — Couch at The Fillmore. Couch is an emerging act with a fresh sound, making their show at The Fillmore an exciting opportunity for fans.

item.title: Waterparks @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2025-12-13 03:00 — Waterparks at The Fillmore. Waterparks is known for their energetic performances and strong connection with fans, making this tour highly anticipated.

item.title: Alex Warren @ The Masonic
item.description: 2025-12-05 04:00 — Alex Warren at The Masonic. Alex Warren and Rob Thomas bring a mix of pop and rock, appealing to a wide audience with their collaborative show.

item.title: Jorma Kaukonen @ The Masonic
item.description: 2025-12-06 03:00 — Jorma Kaukonen at The Masonic. Jorma Kaukonen's birthday celebration is a unique event honoring a legendary musician, attracting dedicated fans.

item.title: Pink Martini @ The Masonic
item.description: 2025-12-07 04:00 — Pink Martini at The Masonic. Pink Martini's All-Stars present a themed concert that promises a diverse and engaging musical experience.

item.title: Yuri @ San Jose Civic
item.description: 2025-12-05 04:30 — Yuri at San Jose Civic. Yuri is a well-known artist in the Latin music scene, ensuring a vibrant and lively performance.

item.title: FLOW @ San Jose Civic
item.description: 2025-12-06 05:00 — FLOW at San Jose Civic. FLOW's tour themed around 'Naruto' appeals to both anime fans and music lovers, creating a unique concert experience.

item.title: Nghtmre @ San Jose Civic
item.description: 2025-12-21 04:00 — Nghtmre at San Jose Civic. NGHTMRE's Mindfull Tour promises an exciting electronic music experience with a strong visual component.

item.title: Key @ Paramount Theatre Oakland
item.description: 2025-12-06 04:00 — Key at Paramount Theatre Oakland. Key's Uncanny Valley show at the Paramount Theatre offers a unique blend of genres and a captivating live performance.

item.title: Mike Campbell & The Dirty Knobs @ Palace of Fine Arts
item.description: 2025-12-10 04:00 — Mike Campbell & The Dirty Knobs at Palace of Fine Arts. Mike Campbell & The Dirty Knobs bring a classic rock vibe to a beautiful venue, appealing to a wide audience.

item.title: The Bouncing Souls @ The UC Theatre
item.description: 2025-12-12 03:00 — The Bouncing Souls at The UC Theatre. The Bouncing Souls and H2O are iconic punk bands, promising an energetic and nostalgic concert experience.

item.title: Anna of the North @ The Independent
item.description: 2025-12-04 04:00 — Anna of the North at The Independent. Anna of the North is an emerging indie pop artist with a growing fanbase, making her show at The Independent noteworthy.
